questions.question_text: You must install an Expressway Edge server pair to enable mobile and remote access for a customer network. Which two requirements are used to install an MRA solution successfully? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Make sure that Expressway-Edge and Expressway-Core servers have their server certificates signed by the same certification authority and the CA certificate is uploaded to the trusted CA store otherwise the Traversal zone will not work.
choices.B: You can deploy Edge servers with multiple network interfaces or with a single network interface. In both scenarios, you must enable NAT for the Internet-facing interface if you are using private Ip addresses.
choices.A: Configure your firewalls to allow traffic from Expressway-Core to Expressway-Edge servers and to allow traffic from internet hosts to Expressway-Edge servers. You do not need to configure firewall rules for traffic from Expressway-Edge to Expressway Core servers.
choices.D: Configure DNS SRV records according. Make sure that you can resolve DNS SRV record_collab-edge_tls.yourdomain.com outside your company network. Make sure that you cannot resolve it inside your company network.

questions.question_text: Which two gateways or trunks are considered to be call-agent controlled? (Choose two.)

choices.C: SIP trunk registered to a SIP proxy server

discussion.content:
Answer is A and D. UCM acts as the call agent for both of these types of gateways.
Skinny Client Control Protocol (SCCP) gateways handle Cisco Unified Communications Manager redundancy, failover, and fallback in the same way as MGCP gateways

my answer: D
reasoning:
A: device pool can be default
B: diagram is illegible
C: no evidence to support this statement (no router version supplied)
D: true - none of the IP addresses provided match up

choices.B: The Cisco UCM is pointing to the wrong IPv4 address of the BR router.
choices.C: The router does not support SRST.
choices.D: The SRST enabled router is not configured correctly.

There are two call control systems in this item.
The Cisco UCM is controlling the DX650, the Cisco Jabber for Windows Client, and the 9971 Video IP Phone.
The Cisco VCS and TMS control the Cisco TelePresence MCU, and the Cisco Jabber TelePresence for Windows.
After adding SRST functionality the SRST does not work. After reviewing the exhibits, which of the following reasons could be causing this failure?

An engineer is configuring Global Dial Plan Replication and wants to prevent the local cluster from routing the Vice President number 5555555555 to the remote cluster. Which action on the remote cluster accomplishes this task?

discussion.content:
Correct answer B.
